item.description: Futures of Digital Archaeology Goals for this week TODO TODO TODO TODO Listen Feed for the podcast here. Read Huggett, Jeremy. 2017 The Apparatus of Digital Archaeology, Internet Archaeology 44. link Dawson, Ian, and Reilly, Paul. 2019. “Messy Assemblages, Residuality and Recursion within a Phygital Nexus” Epoiesen link AND RESPONSE by Rachel Opitz link Morgan, Colleen. 2019.
